function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Risk of virus transmission via sewage due to human feces contamination in wastewater","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in housing layout and design leading to potential lack of privacy and overcrowding","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection of indoor finishing materials impacting virus lifetimes on surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission risk through contact with surfaces in bathrooms and public restrooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health risks associated with toxic antimicrobial additives in indoor finishing materials","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to potential spread of viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of virus transmission via contaminated surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strain on health systems during unexpected situations like pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to visit hospitals or healthcare facilities due to lockdowns","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited involvement of architects and urban planners in response to pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on the social pillar in sustainability assessment rating systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal priority given to key sustainability categories in rating systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial risks in oecd countries due to living costs","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of supply chains and logistical challenges during quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to long supply paths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited internet access for households in the commonwealth of independent states cis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic fallout leading to increased poverty and malnutrition in central asian countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in human-to-human interaction due to delivery and public services, risking the spread of contagious sites","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability of home quarantine experience based on home conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowded housing leading to lack of privacy and inadequate sanitation facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor waste management of home quarantine waste","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of recycling practices during a pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased water consumption and lack of sustainable water use during pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased household energy consumption due to remote work and
